github的ssh登录需要修改git目录下的config文件如下：
[remote "origin"]
	url = https://github.com/shmhan/suiji.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
	remote = origin
	merge = refs/heads/master
修改后如下：
[remote "origin"]
	url = git@github.com:shmhan/suiji.git
	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
	remote = origin
	merge = refs/heads/master
